name: Man vs Dead: Zombie Warfare
description:
In 2061, Dr Heisenberg's scientific research fails and a virus spreads across the hospital.All of the patients transform into monsters.
You are the only person who has virus resistance thus you are uninfected and a shooter. Unfortunately to stop the spread of the virus, you have to kill all the zombie patients.
Walking deads are hungry for blood.When you battle in zombie warfare you will either win or die!
You are the only one who can save the world. Hurry up! Shoot them all!
_____________________________________
ZOMBIES
- Wipe out the zombies in the hospital and survive till the war ends.
- The zombies may be in the hospital, dormitory or in Dr's room.
- Aiming and shooting their heads is the best way to kill zombies.
- Go for the zombie leaders so that their group can disband.
- Fire your guns till all zombies dead.
_____________________________________
LEADERBOARD
- Track and compare your progress with your friends; and beat your friends' score.
- Reach the first place on the leaderboard.
_____________________________________
WEAPONS
-Multiple weapons can be armed (knife, rifle, shotgun, machine gun, grenade launcher)
-Take coins from zombies to buy new weapons
-Try to use weapons efficiently, bullet may finish before wave ends
_____________________________________
INTENSE GRAPHICS
- 3D Realistic graphics
- Realistic terrifying zombie characters
- Realistic blood effects
- Zombie scream effects to make you feel scared
_____________________________________
AMMO AND HEALTH
ammo and health drops from zombies randomly
you can also load your magazine and health point from aid kit(next to main gate)
No problem even if you dont have wifi or internet connetion, you can play this game in offline.
